org.escoladeltreball.ulisesmap.converter

Class Converter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.escoladeltreball.ulisesmap.converter.Converter

  • public class Converter
extends java.lang.Object
    Converter Client helper Class. Converts the information the client sends to JSON String and converts the information the servlet to object specific.
